meta.title: Smartphone Free Badge Maker
noscript.title: JavaScript Required
noscript.description: This application requires JavaScript and WebAssembly to function. Please enable JavaScript in your browser settings.
header.badgeAria: School crest plus SVO lightning equals combined logo
header.title: Smartphone Free Badge Maker
header.description: Fast, private image tool that helps schools and individuals show their solidarity with Smartphone Free initiatives by combining the official lightning logo with school logos and profile photos in seconds.
header.highlight1: Two overlay modes for school logos and portraits.
header.highlight2: Download-ready exports with or without transparency.
header.highlight3: Private: everything runs in your browser.
introSteps.upload.title: Upload
introSteps.upload.body: Drop any PNG or JPEG to start.
introSteps.make.title: Make
introSteps.make.body: Combine splits or soft overlays to with your asset.
introSteps.download.title: Download
introSteps.download.body: Export instantly in PNG or JPEG to use on any platform.
examples.school.label: School logos
examples.school.title: Directional split
examples.school.caption: Directional splits add the lightning bar without obscuring mascots or typography.
examples.profile.label: Profile photos
examples.profile.title: Transparent overlay
examples.profile.caption: Soft transparency keeps faces visible while signaling support with the lightning inset.
steps.upload.title: Upload your image
steps.upload.description: Choose a file to get started.
upload.area.aria: Click or drag and drop to upload an image file. Supported formats: PNG, JPEG, WebP.
upload.area.heading: Choose an image
upload.area.subheading: or drag and drop it here
steps.manipulate.title: Adjust & compare
steps.manipulate.description: Apply filters, crop, and preview the results.
panels.logo.title: Best for school logo
panels.logo.subtitle: Directional splits for icons and marks.
panels.profile.title: Best for profile picture
panels.profile.subtitle: Soft transparent overlays with live opacity.
panels.profile.opacityAria: Adjust overlay opacity from 0 to 100 percent.
crop.instructions.title: Drag the selection to position your crop area.
crop.instructions.body: To apply crop, use one of the filters.
steps.download.title: Download & share
steps.download.description: Pick your quality and export the processed result.
download.option.small.title: Small JPEG
download.option.small.aria: Small JPEG - smallest file size, no transparency
download.option.balanced.title: JPEG
download.option.balanced.description: Standard compression (~50-70% original size), no transparency
download.option.png.title: PNG with Transparency
download.option.png.description: Larger file, preserves transparent areas (for overlay effects)
download.option.png.aria: PNG with transparency - preserves transparent areas (lightning overlay)
errors.wasmUnsupported: WebAssembly is not supported in your browser. Please use a modern browser like Chrome 57+, Firefox 52+, Safari 11+, or Edge 16+.
errors.wasmLoad: Failed to load the WebAssembly module.
errors.invalidFile: Please select a valid image file (PNG, JPEG, or WebP).
errors.noImage: No image loaded or module not initialized.
errors.overlayMissing: Overlay image not loaded. Please ensure lightning.png is available.
errors.noProcessedImage: No processed image ready to download.
